entry.question: If I have a Micromaster in Bot mode, and I use an action that taps it, such as Inferno Breath or Swap Missions, will tapping it with one of those actions let me activate the Micromaster's Tap ability?
entry.answer: No. Those are mutually exclusive. Tap abilities on Micro Masters are costs for triggering their abilities, so other in-game actions do not allow you to use that ability.

entry.question: I have a ruling question on Insecticon Skrapnel - Insecticon leader. If my opponent attaches Combat Commands onto Ironhide - Steadfast Brawler and declares an attack into Skrapnel while Skrapnel is in bot mode, and uses Combat Commands’ effect to flip Autobot Hot Rod - Impulsive fighter and deal 1 damage to Skrapnel, do I only take 2 damage from the attack since Skrapnel is defending and any damage dealt to him while defending counts towards his skill based off of the FAQ in the Transformers official app?
entry.answer: Apologies for the confusion here. We ruled this differently, but the FAQ was apparently not updated to reflect that. Here’s how that question should read: “Q: Let’s say Insecticon Skrapnel defends and the attacker has an ability that deals damage to him. Does that damage count for Insecticon Skrapnel’s ability? A: No, only attack damage counts towards Skrapnel’s ability. Damage dealt by other abilities won’t count, even if it happens during an attack.”

entry.question: If you are playing an uninjured Captain Ironhide and you want to trigger his Bot mode ability, can you swap on an Energon Axe?
entry.answer: No. Energon Axe can only be put on damaged characters.

entry.question: If I have Captain Ironhide with Static Laser of Ironhide in the weapon slot and Mounted Missiles in the armor slot, and I attack with Captain Ironhide in bot mode, can I swap the Mounted Missiles with a blue pip weapon and it still be in the armor slot?
entry.answer: No. Unless either the weapon or the character states that the weapon can be in the armor slot, it can’t. So in this scenario, you would not be able to swap one weapon for another weapon from the armor slot However, you could swap Mounted Missiles for a blue weapon and put that weapon in the weapon slot, which would scrap the Static Laser of Ironhide.

entry.question: When a character is KO’d by an attack from a Battering Ram, does he flip first before going to the KO area or KO first before flipping?
entry.answer: If a character with Battering Ram KO’s a defending character, that defending character is not flipped.

entry.question: Are you allowed to play Collateral Damage even if you do not have a weapon on the field? Or if there are no weapons on the field for either players and you just want the discard effect?
entry.answer: You can play Collateral Damage even if there are no weapons on the field or cards in your hands to scrap. Do as much as you can.

entry.question: Can you flip any character in the KO area and use its ability if it reads when you flip to this mode? Or is it only for characters that specifically say “When you flip in the KO area”?
entry.answer: Although you can flip any character in the KO area, their abilities only work if specifically stated on their card.

entry.question: Does Device Virus scrap an upgrade from your hand or one that's attached to one of your characters?
entry.answer: You must scrap an upgrade attached to one of your characters.

entry.question: Theoretically speaking, say I have a character with Focus 6, but only 3 cards are left in my deck. What would happen after I pick up those 3 cards to look at? Would I set aside those 3, reshuffle my discard pile to become my deck, and then look at the top 3 of the new deck in addition to the 3 set aside, or would Focus 6 be reduced to Focus 3?

If I attack with either Optimus Prime - Battlefield Legend or Alpha Trion and flip an EMP Wave for Attack flips and choose to play it, after it taps all characters in play does the attack still take place?
entry.answer: “Yes. That’s a really good idea.” - Ken Nagle, Transformers TCG Design Lead.

entry.question: Can you use I Still Function to replay a Battle Master?
How do Spare Parts and Salvage for Parts interact with each other, Salvage being played by my opponent, and Spare being on my own character?
entry.answer: If the character with Spare Parts has a weapon and/or an armor, Spare Parts will save one of them. Spare Parts won’t count when determining how much damage to repair.

entry.question: When attacking with Optimus Prime - Battlefield Legend we know you can't play Supercharge from your attack flip, but what if you play Leap of Faith and scrap Supercharge?
entry.answer: You CAN play Supercharge off of OPBL (or via Leap of Faith), but it probably won’t do what you want it to do. It does give Bold 3, but because battle cards have already been flipped for this attack, that Bold 3 won’t do anything. But you could still play it. You know, for fun. However, if the character you give Bold 3 to gets to attack later in the same turn, that Bold 3 will be in effect.

entry.question: If Optimus Prime - Battlefield Legend checks a secret action on attack can he set it?
entry.answer: Yes, although it won’t be much of a surprise to your opponent.
